com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.plugin

Class GeneiousAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.AbstractAction
      • com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.plugin.GeneiousAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionListener, Serializable, Cloneable, EventListener, Action
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GeneiousAction.Divider, GeneiousAction.SubMenu, GeneiousAction.ToggleAction

    public abstract class GeneiousAction
extends AbstractAction
    Geneious action items.

    An action is a user interface item such as a menu entry, button etc. Plugins specify such items by creating a GeneiousAction object. See GeneiousActionOptions for details concerning the various attributes an action may have.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  GeneiousAction.Divider
      A subclass of GeneiousAction which is placed in a toolbar/menu as a divider.
      static class  GeneiousAction.SubMenu
      A subclass of GeneiousAction which is placed in the menu as a submenu which opens to the right; In the toolbar, it will appear as a drop-down menu that opens downwards.
      static class  GeneiousAction.ToggleAction
      A subclass of GeneiousAction which is placed in a toolbar/menu as a toggle button or check box menu item.

        name - Name of the action to display in menu or toolbar, must not be null
        description - Description of the actions function, used as a tooltip, or null to have no description

      • GeneiousAction

        public GeneiousAction(String name,
              String description,
              Icons icons)
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the action to display in menu or toolbar, must not be null
        description - Description of the actions function, used as a tooltip, or null to have no description
        icons - Icons to display in the toolbar and menu, or null for no icons

      • GeneiousAction

        @Deprecated
public GeneiousAction(String name,
                         String description,
                         Icons icons,
                         GeneiousActionOptions.Category category,
                         GeneiousActionOptions.MainMenu menu,
                         boolean isInPopupMenu,
                         boolean isInMainToolbar,
                         KeyStroke shortcut)
        Deprecated. Construct GeneiousActionOptions first then use constructor GeneiousAction(GeneiousActionOptions) instead.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the action to display in menu or toolbar, must not be null
        description - Description of the actions function, used as a tooltip, or null to have no description
        icons - Icons to display in the toolbar and menu, or null for no icons
        category - Category that this action fits into, or GeneiousActionOptions.Category.None if it doesn't fit a category, must not be null.
        menu - Main menu to place the action in, GeneiousActionOptions.MainMenu.NotPresent to have the action in no menu (must not be null). Ignored for actions returned from an ActionProvider.
        isInPopupMenu - True to have the action placed in the popup menu. If this is a Service action, it will be placed in the service popup menu, if this is a DocumentOperation action, it will be placed in the document table popup menu. Ignored for actions returned from an ActionProvider.
        isInMainToolbar - True to have the action placed in the toolbar at the top of the main window. Ignored for actions returned from an ActionProvider.
        shortcut - Keyboard shortcut for this action

      • GeneiousAction

        public GeneiousAction(GeneiousActionOptions actionOptions)
        Construct a GeneiousAction from GeneiousActionOptions. All the properties of the action will be determined by the GeneiousActionOptions.
        Parameters:
        actionOptions - GeneiousActionOptions that will determine the properties of this action
        See Also:
        GeneiousActionOptions

      • GeneiousAction

        public GeneiousAction(GeneiousAction internalAction)
        Creates a GeneiousAction that wraps another action. This is useful for creating a way to essentially intercept the actionPerformed method of a GeneiousAction.

        internalAction.actionPerformed will only be called if this action's implementation of actionPerformed calls internalAction.actionPerformed manually (passing on the actionEvent object).

        Parameters:
        internalAction - the internal GeneiousAction that all methods are delegated to.

      • setMainMenuLocation

        public GeneiousAction setMainMenuLocation(GeneiousActionOptions.MainMenu menu)
        Set the location of this action in the main menu (with the default position of 0.5 - see setMainMenuLocation(com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.plugin.GeneiousActionOptions.MainMenu, double)).
        Parameters:
        menu - Main menu to place the action in, GeneiousActionOptions.MainMenu.NotPresent to have the action in no menu (must not be null). Ignored for actions returned from an ActionProvider.
        Returns:
        this (for convenience eg. return new GeneiousAction(...).setMainMenuLocation(...);)
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if called after a get method has been called (set methods must be called immediately after constructing the options)

      • setMainMenuLocation

        public GeneiousAction setMainMenuLocation(GeneiousActionOptions.MainMenu menu,
                                 double mainMenuPosition)
        Set the location of this action in the main menu.
        Parameters:
        menu - Main menu to place the action in, GeneiousActionOptions.MainMenu.NotPresent to have the action in no menu (must not be null). Ignored for actions returned from an ActionProvider.
        mainMenuPosition - A relative position of the action in its menu. Should be between 0 and 1, where 0 is top-most and 1 is the bottom-most. 0.5 is the default. If multiple actions have the same position, they are ordered alphabetically.
        Returns:
        this (for convenience eg. return new GeneiousAction(...).setMainmenuLocation(...);)
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if called after a get method has been called (set methods must be called immediately after constructing the options)

        Set the location of this actio in the main toolbar (with the default position of 0.5 - see setInMainToolbar(boolean, double)).
        Parameters:
        isInMainToolbar - True to have the action placed in the toolbar at the top of the main window. Ignored for actions returned from an ActionProvider.
        Returns:
        this (for convenience eg. return new GeneiousAction(...).setInMainToolbar(...);)
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if called after a get method has been called (set methods must be called immediately after constructing the options)

      • setInMainToolbar

        public GeneiousAction setInMainToolbar(boolean isInMainToolbar,
                              double mainToolbarPosition)
        Set the location of this action in the main toolbar.
        Parameters:
        isInMainToolbar - True to have the action placed in the toolbar at the top of the main window. Ignored for actions returned from an ActionProvider.
        mainToolbarPosition - A relative position of the action in its toolbar. Should be between 0 and 1, where 0 is left-most and 1 is the right-most. 0.5 is the default. If multiple actions have the same position, they are ordered alphabetically.
        Returns:
        this (for convenience eg. return new GeneiousAction(...).setInMainToolbar(...);)
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if called after a get method has been called (set methods must be called immediately after constructing the options)

      • setInPopupMenu

        public GeneiousAction setInPopupMenu(boolean isInPopupMenu)
        Set the location of this action in the popup menu (with the default position of 0.5 - see setInPopupMenu(boolean, double)).
        Parameters:
        isInPopupMenu - True to have the action placed in the popup menu. If this is a Service action, it will be placed in the service popup menu, if this is a DocumentOperation action, it will be placed in the document table popup menu. Ignored for actions returned from an ActionProvider.
        Returns:
        this (for convenience eg. return new GeneiousAction(...).setInPopupMenu(...);)
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if called after a get method has been called (set methods must be called immediately after constructing the options)

      • setInPopupMenu

        public GeneiousAction setInPopupMenu(boolean isInPopupMenu,
                            double popupMenuPosition)
        Set the location of this action in the popup menu. If this is a Service action, it will be placed in the service popup menu, if this is a DocumentOperation action, it will be placed in the document table popup menu. This is currently ignored for actions returned from an ActionProvider.
        Parameters:
        isInPopupMenu - True to have the action placed in the popup menu.
        popupMenuPosition - A relative position of the action in its menu. Should be between 0 and 1, where 0 is top-most and 1 is the bottom-most. 0.5 is the default. If multiple actions have the same position, they are ordered alphabetically.
        Returns:
        this (for convenience eg. return new GeneiousAction(...).setInPopupMenu(...);)
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if called after a get method has been called (set methods must be called immediately after constructing the options)

      • setProOnly

        public GeneiousAction setProOnly(boolean isProOnly)
        Set whether this action requires an active license. If it does, then the action will be disabled automatically if the user doesn't have an active Geneious license.
        Parameters:
        isProOnly - whether this action requires an active license
        Returns:
        this (for convenience eg. return new GeneiousAction(...).setProOnly(...);)
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if called after a get method has been called (set methods must be called immediately after constructing the options)

      • asMenuItem

        public JComponent asMenuItem()
        Create a JComponent for this action which can be added to a JMenu. The returned component will differ depending on the class of action: GeneiousAction = JMenuItem, ToggleAction = JCheckBoxMenuItem, SubMenu = JMenu, Divider = JPopupMenu.Separator.

        If multiple components are constructed from a single GeneiousAction then all of the components will be in sync with the state of the action. eg. If two check box menu items are made from a single action, when one of the item is checked, the other one will become checked immediately also. Menu items made using this method will also be in sync with components constructed via asToolbarButton() and vice-versa.

        Returns:
        JComponent for this action that can be placed in a JMenu. This is usually a JMenuItem except in the case where this action is a Divider

      • asToolbarButton

        public AbstractButton asToolbarButton()
        Create an AbstractButton for this action which can be added to a Toolbar. The returned component will differ depending on the class of action: GeneiousAction = JButton, ToggleAction = JToggleButton, SubMenu = JButton (which triggers a popup menu), Divider = anonymous subclass of AbstractButton which is not clickable and is drawn as a vertical gray line.

        If multiple components are constructed from a single GeneiousAction then all of the components will be in sync with the state of the action. eg. If two toggle buttons are made from a single action, when one of the buttons is toggled, the other one will toggle immediately also. Buttons made using this method will also be in sync with components constructed via asMenuItem() and vice-versa.

        Returns:
        AbstractButton for this action that can be placed in a toolbar.

      • getActionsInMainMenuOrder

        public static List<GeneiousAction> getActionsInMainMenuOrder(List<GeneiousAction> actions)
        Get a sorted list of actions in the order determined by GeneiousActionOptions.getMainMenuPosition()/alphabetically for any actions with the same main menu position value.
        Parameters:
        actions - list of actions to sort
        Returns:
        a list containing exactly the same actions that were passed in, except sorted by their main menu positions.

      • getActionsInPopupMenuOrder

        public static List<GeneiousAction> getActionsInPopupMenuOrder(List<GeneiousAction> actions)

        Parameters:
        actions - list of actions to sort
        Returns:

        public static List<GeneiousAction> getActionsInToolbarOrder(List<GeneiousAction> actions)

        Parameters:
        actions - list of actions to sort
        Returns:
        a list containing exactly the same actions that were passed in, except sorted by their toolbar positions.
